title: The Disgusting Truth About Your Vitamin D3
p1: What if we told you that more than 99% of Vitamin D3 supplements come from sheep's grease? That's right - lanolin, the waxy, greasy substance scraped from sheep, is processed into what you think is 'natural' Vitamin D3.
p2: PurePlantD3Â® changes everything. Using our proprietary actinic process, we transform organic pine tree sterols into pure, bioidentical cholecalciferol - exactly how your body makes it naturally.
conclusion: No sheep. No grease. No compromise.
